trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There was one other sighting in Philadelphia on or around November 26th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home in my car, and where I live is a strip of parks; well in the middle driving i saw a bright flash in the sky over the parks, I didnt think much of it, but then it happened again, the flash was like a brilliant blue color, there were a thin layer of clouds, and at first I thought it was a helicopter, but I didnt hear anything, and then I thought it was lightning, but it was far too cold out, and then I just stopped driving and watched it for a couple of minutes. It was around 8pm. and the way that it moved was in a wierd patteren, and the light was above the clouds and it was massive. The feeling I had was I was just mezmorized, then a couple of days later, I finally told a famly member, and they had said that they recorded a show on UFO sightings, so I watched it and I felt shocked like wow, I really thought I was going out of my mind. I really wish that you help verify what I seen a few nights ago. Thankyou, Lori Strybuc
Summary: Big bright flashing light, moving in different directions.
